Uses of Package
suncertify.db

Packages that use suncertify.db
suncertify.db   
suncertify.gui   
suncertify.network   
 

Classes in suncertify.db used by suncertify.db
DB
          An interface implemented by classes that provide access to the general records database.
DuplicateKeyException
          Thrown when inserting a new element into the database and the input data violates the database's primary key.
InvalidSchemaException
          This exception should be thrown when a inconsistent schema is read from the database.
Record
          The Record object is a representation of a record of the database.
RecordNotFoundException
          Thrown when a search is performed and the specified record does not exist or was marked as deleted in the database.
UnknownDBException
          The exception is thrown when the database id read from the database header does not match the one expected.
